name: Ship Builder Simulator
description:
You came to a small island - naked, poor and extremely ambitious. You are a boatbuilder and you want to build your own shipyard. You will start from scratch, you will be forced to cut down many trees and excavate a lot of metal to build your boatbuilding empire. This is the only way to earn money and survive in this new place.

Main Features

  • Use photorealistic graphics to feel like a builder of wooden ships!
  • Compete with other players - fight them and destroy their ships with powerful cannons mounted on your ship during PVP naval battles.
  • Build and sell your ships.
  • Invite friends to your shipyard! They can help you with gathering resources and with other activities.
  • Spend money on upgrading your shipyard, workshop and buying the materials you need.
